ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Entirely optional, if farm is going well just ignore it and go for a straight Perseverance instead.
ItemTooltips.tango: With the new 4 stacks of Tangoes, you don`t even need a salve anymore
ItemTooltips.pers: Don't forget that the Ring of Health can be picked up from the side shop whereas the Void Stone requires the secret shop.
ItemTooltips.sphere: The core of this build, Linkens often gives you just enough time to Time Lapse out of a tricky situation.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: A core item on Weaver whose Geminate attack benefits entirely from the additional damage.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: The increased attacks from Geminate Attack mean even more chance for crits. An interesting alternative if you`re the prime Aegis carrier of the team is a Rapier
ItemTooltips.desolator: Whilst the second Geminate Attack doesn`t gain the orb effect, it still benefits hugely from the armor reduction which is very easily stacked on Weaver.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: More of a situational pickup for when farm isn`t going so well, combined with your swarm this ensures huge armor reduction.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: You`ll most likely want to build the Basilius first due to the mana regen and lane pushing ability. Make sure to turn it off when you`re trying to static farm!

AbilityTooltips.weaver_the_swarm: Hugely underrated, at max level they deal 600 damage if not removed and the armor reduction is critical. Try casting after a teamfight has been initiated so that they don`t draw attention.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_shukuchi: Your bread and butter escape + damage. Try not to spam it too much at low levels since it can very quickly drain your mana pool.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_geminate_attack: Your main dps comes from this skill, try and balance levelling it with The Swarm to gain maximum mid game power.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_time_lapse: An absolute life-saver, use it after you`ve been bursted down in teamfights. If you die in the middle of a fight without using it you can also buyback and instantly use it to get back into the fray.
